resources.string:
As students of California State University, Long Beach, many of us begin our school days with dread as we struggle to find parking. It is always frustrating to circle around the parking lots hoping you find a parking spot and wonâ€™t be late to class. 


	 The Park King app helps all drivers easily find and navigate their way to open parking spots in a parking lot that is registered with our system. Park King uses smart cameras that utilize machine learning and computer vision algorithms to detect whether or not a parking spot is open or occupied.


	 The Park King system is able to view how many and which specific parking spots are open by using a cloud server that receives data from our smart cameras and processes it and then sends it to the smartphone app.
